title: "Machine learning can be used to track public interest in COVID-19 topics on popular internet sites"
excerpt: "Machine learning can be used to track surges in interest in health topics on popular online comment boards, like Reddit, according to a new study conducted during the COVID-19 outbreak by researchers in the Perelman School of Medicine at the University of Pennsylvania (Penn Medicine)."
